title: Google Android Pixel Security Update - October 2019
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided Android/Pixel security updates for October 2019. All Pixel devices running Android 10 will receive these software updates as part of the October OTA, which begins rolling out to users today. We encourage you to check your Android version and update to receive the latest features. 

To find out in detail what has been updated, check out the official update here.

Overview : 

Build Number: 
Pixel 1 (XL) / Pixel 2 (XL) : QP1A.191005.007.A1
Pixel 3 (XL) / Pixel 3a (XL): QP1A.191005.007
Notable fixes: 
Fix for memory drain in UI
Fix for missing heads-up notifications
Fix for missing notifications in Pixel Stand mode
Fix for bootloop in certain device locale modes 
Wifi stability improvements
Gesture navigation stability improvements
System stability improvements
Sensor calibration improvements

Details of security fixes are found in this link : 
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin


Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
